title: The minimum width of tread without nosing shall be 25 cm
clause_text: The minimum width of tread without nosing shall be 25 cm. for an internal staircase for residential buildings. In the case of other buildings, the minimum tread shall be 30 cm. The treads shall be constructed and maintained in a manner to prevent slipping.
